name: Yum China Holdings, Inc.
description: Yum China Holdings, Inc. is a leading restaurant company in China, operating some of the most recognizable brands in the food service sector. Established in 2016 as a spin-off from Yum! Brands, Inc., Yum China manages a diverse portfolio of restaurant concepts, including KFC, Pizza Hut, Taco Bell, and several other local brands. With a strong focus on innovation, customer experience, and digital transformation, Yum China has established itself as a leader in the rapidly evolving Chinese dining landscape. The company emphasizes quality food and exceptional service, adapting its menu offerings to meet the tastes and preferences of Chinese consumers. Yum China has embraced technology, utilizing mobile ordering and delivery services to enhance customer convenience and engagement. In its commitment to sustainability, Yum China is actively working on reducing its environmental impact through various initiatives, such as responsible sourcing, waste reduction, and energy efficiency. The company operates thousands of restaurants across China and continues to expand its footprint, making it a key player in the global fast-food industry.

seo.meta_title: Yum China Holdings, Inc. | Leading Restaurant Company in China
seo.meta_description: Discover Yum China Holdings, Inc., a leading player in the Chinese restaurant industry, offering popular brands like KFC and Pizza Hut. Learn about our commitment to innovation, quality, and sustainability.

faq.question: What brands does Yum China operate?
faq.answer: Yum China operates KFC, Pizza Hut, Taco Bell, and several local brands.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Yum China?
faq.answer: Joey Wat is the CEO of Yum China Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Yum China headquartered?
faq.answer: Yum China is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
